done.text:
‚úÖ Successfully completed the task!

I have successfully created a new Trello board called 'Marketing Campaign Q1' following all the steps in the workflow:

**Workflow Completion Summary:**
1. ‚úÖ Navigated to Trello homepage (https://trello.com)
2. ‚úÖ Authenticated using Google SSO (pranavkenz.17@gmail.com)
3. ‚úÖ Located the 'Create' button in the primary navigation
4. ‚úÖ Initiated 'Create New Board' action
5. ‚úÖ Input the board title 'Marketing Campaign Q1'
6. ‚úÖ Confirmed the creation of the new board
7. ‚úÖ Verified successful loading of the newly created board

**Board Details:**
- Board Name: Marketing Campaign Q1
- Board URL: https://trello.com/b/sHmGXuNE/marketing-campaign-q1
- Default Lists Created: To Do, Doing, Done
- Status: Active and ready to use

The board is now fully functional and ready for you to start adding cards and organizing your marketing campaign tasks. A Premium trial (14 days) has been automatically activated for this account.
